briefTitle: Comparison of NN5401 With Insulin Glargine in Insulin Naive Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Trial Comparing Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart With Insulin Glargine in Insulin Naive Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes (BOOSTâ„¢: JAPAN)
summary: This trial is conducted in Japan. The aim of this trial is to investigate the efficacy and safety of NN5401 (insulin degludec/insulin aspart) with insulin glargine in subjects with type 2 diabetes in Japan. Depending on pre-trial oral anti-diabetic drugs (OADs), subjects continued at the same dose and dosing frequency.
